MediaRecorderResume.summary: The resume() method of the interface is used to resume media recording when it has been previously paused.

remarks.para: If is already "recording", calling resume() has no effect.

When the resume() method is invoked, the browser queues a task that runs
the following steps:

-Using the MediaStream Recording API
-Web Dictaphone: MediaRecorder +
getUserMedia + Web Audio API visualization demo, by Chris Mills (source on GitHub.)
-simpl.info MediaStream Recording demo, by Sam Dutton.
-
